bill.title: Interisland Electric Transmission Cable System
bill.description: Establishes a regulatory structure for the installation and implementation of an interisland high voltage electric transmission cable system and for the construction of on-island transmission infrastructure. Effective July 1, 2012. (SB2785 HD2)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to ENE/EDT/CPN, WAM.
(S) Re-Referred to ENE/CPN, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on ENE/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-02-12 2:55PM in conference room 225.

(S) The committee(s) on ENE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in ENE were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Gabbard, English, Green; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN deferred the measure until 02-03-12 9:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Galuteria, Green, Nishihara, Solomon; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from ENE/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2106) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on on 02-23-12 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Kahele, Kouchi, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kim, Ryan, Wakai ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2748) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-06-12.

(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Fukunaga, Ihara, Kim, Ryan, Wakai . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Hee). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 308) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to WLO/EEP, CPC, FIN, referral sheet 41
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by WLO/EEP on Monday, 03-12-12 9:15AM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on WLO recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Chang, Har, Cabanilla, Coffman, Ito, Kawakami, Nakashima; Ayes with reservations: none; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Riviere, Thielen; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Herkes.

(H) The committees on EEP recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Coffman, Kawakami, Cabanilla, Chang, Har, Ito, Nakashima; Ayes with reservations: none; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Riviere, Thielen; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Herkes.
(H) Reported from WLO/EEP (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1000-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with Representative(s) Carroll, Ching, Fontaine, Marumoto, Pine, Ward voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Hanohano, Riviere, Thielen, Wooley voting no (4) and Representative(s) Herkes, Souki excused (2).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Monday, 03-19-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Brower, Cabanilla, Coffman, Ito, Keith-Agaran, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Marumoto; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Thielen; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Herkes, Carroll, Ching.
(H) Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1181-12), recommending referral to FIN.

(H) Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Ching, Fontaine, Johanson, Marumoto, Pine, Ward, Wooley voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Hanohano, Riviere, Thielen voting no (3) and Representative(s) Chang, Herkes, Nakashima excused (3).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 03-30-12 5:00PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Marumoto, Ward; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Riviere; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Kawakami.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1593-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-10-12.
(H) Floor Amendment No. 5 offered by Rep. Riviere
(H) Floor amendment failed following voice vote. Excused, 0 (none).

(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Carroll, Ching, Fontaine, Johanson, C. Lee voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Hanohano, Marumoto, Riviere, Thielen, Ward, Wooley voting no (6) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 496).
(S) Senate disagrees with House amendments.
(H) Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 679).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Gabbard, Chair; Baker, Kouchi, Co-Chair(s); English.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 757).
(S) Senate Conferees discharged.
(S) Reconsideration of action taken on 04-12-12 in disagreeing to the House amendments.
(S) Senate agrees with House amendments, with Senators Chun Oakland, Ihara and Slom voting "NO". Placed on the calendar for Final Reading on 05-03-12.
(H) Received notice of all Senate conferees being discharged (Sen. Com. No. 834).

(S) Passed Final Reading. 22 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) English, Fukunaga, Ige, Ihara, Kim, Nishihara, Ryan, Shimabukuro, Tokuda, Wakai . 3 No(es): Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Hee, Slom. 0 Excused: none.
(H) Received notice of reconsideration, Senate agreement, and Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 842).
(S) Enrolled to Governor.
